meta.description: Language labels for the CIC User Registration extension in the FRONTEND

languageKey.label: Configure Plugin Instance
Disable Ajax
There was a problem with your registration. Please review the errors below, correct, and re-submit the form.
There was a problem updating your profile. Please review any errors below, correct, and re-submit the form.
Email is a required field.
The email address you entered is invalid.
Password is a required field.
Confirm password is a required field.
First name is a required field.
Last name is a required field.
Password is a required field.
Password must be at least six characters long.
Passwords do not match.
Confirm password must match the password field.
Email must be between 3 and 50 characters.
An account with this email address already exists.
Before registering, you must agree to Dodge's terms and services.
Login
You have been successfully logged out. To sign in again, enter your username and password below.
Sorry, but we didn't recognize your email or password. If you don't have an account, click "sign up" above.
You have successfully signed in.
Welcome back! Please enter your email and password below to sign in.
Forgot Password?
Email Address:
Password:
Confirm Password:
Return to Login Form
Email Address:
Forgot Your Password?
Reset Password
Your password reset request has been processed. Please check your inbox for an email message containing the reset password link.
We were unable to find an account associated with the email address you entered.
Enter the email address associated with your account in the field below. An email will be sent to this address containing your username and a link that will allow you to reset your password.
You are currently signed in. To logout, click the button below.
Click here to update your account information
Please enter an enrollment code.
Your account has been successfully added to the %s group.
The group enrollment code that you entered was invalid. Please check your code and try again.
Please log in before enrolling.
Url "%s" for redirect was not accepted!
Url "%s" contained an XSS attack and was cleaned!
The reset password link you clicked on is invalid.
Your password has been updated. Please sign-in below.
Reset Password
Please enter a new password below. Passwords must be at least six characters long.
The email address you entered was invalid.
